android.car.hardware.property

类 CruiseControlState

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.hardware.property.CruiseControlState

  • public class CruiseControlState
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to enumerate the current state of VehiclePropertyIds.CRUISE_CONTROL_STATE.

    This enum could be extended in future releases to include additional feature states.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CruiseControlState.CruiseControlStateInt 

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int ACTIVATED
      CC is enabled and activated, so the ADAS system is actively controlling the vehicle's speed.
      static int ENABLED
      CC is enabled, but the ADAS system is not actively controlling the vehicle's speed.
      static int FORCED_DEACTIVATION_WARNING
      When CC is in the ACTIVATED state but may potentially need to deactivate because of external conditions (e.g. roads curvature is too extreme, the driver does not have their hands on the steering wheel for a long period of time, or the driver is not paying attention), then the ADAS system will notify the driver of a potential need to deactivate and give control back to the driver.
      static int OTHER
      This state is used as an alternative for any CruiseControlState value that is not defined in the platform.
      static int SUSPENDED
      Suspended state indicates CC is enabled and was activated, but now is suspended.
      static int USER_OVERRIDE
      Most CC implementations allow the driver to override CC.

      Returns a user-friendly representation of a CruiseControlState.

    • 字段详细资料

      • OTHER

        public static final int OTHER
        This state is used as an alternative for any CruiseControlState value that is not defined in the platform. Ideally, implementations of VehiclePropertyIds.CRUISE_CONTROL_STATE should not use this state. The framework can use this field to remain backwards compatible if CruiseControlState is extended to include additional states.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ENABLED

        public static final int ENABLED
        CC is enabled, but the ADAS system is not actively controlling the vehicle's speed.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ACTIVATED

        public static final int ACTIVATED
        CC is enabled and activated, so the ADAS system is actively controlling the vehicle's speed.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • USER_OVERRIDE

        public static final int USER_OVERRIDE
        Most CC implementations allow the driver to override CC. This means that the car has determined it should maintain a certain speed and/or maintain a certain distance from a leading vehicle, but the driver decides to take over and do something else. This is often done for safety reasons and to ensure that the driver can always take control of the vehicle. This state will be set when the user is actively overriding the CC system.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • SUSPENDED

        public static final int SUSPENDED
        Suspended state indicates CC is enabled and was activated, but now is suspended. This could be caused by the user tapping the brakes while CC is ACTIVATED or the user using the VehiclePropertyIds.CRUISE_CONTROL_COMMAND to suspend CC. Once CC is suspended, the CC system gives control of the vehicle back to the driver, but saves the target speed and/or target time gap settings in case CC is resumed. This state can also be used when adaptive/predictive CC slows to a stop and needs a user signal to start again.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FORCED_DEACTIVATION_WARNING

        public static final int FORCED_DEACTIVATION_WARNING
        When CC is in the ACTIVATED state but may potentially need to deactivate because of external conditions (e.g. roads curvature is too extreme, the driver does not have their hands on the steering wheel for a long period of time, or the driver is not paying attention), then the ADAS system will notify the driver of a potential need to deactivate and give control back to the driver.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值
